org.trippi
Interface TriplestoreWriter

All Superinterfaces:
TriplestoreReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcurrentTriplestoreWriter, MultiTriplestoreWriter, SynchronizedTriplestoreWriter
public interface TriplestoreWriter
extends TriplestoreReader

A TriplestoreReader that also provides buffered write access.

Author:
cwilper@cs.cornell.edu

flushBuffer

void flushBuffer()
                 throws IOException,
                        TrippiException
Flush the buffer (write the changes to the triplestore).

Throws:
IOException
TrippiException

setFlushErrorHandler

void setFlushErrorHandler(FlushErrorHandler h)
Set the (optional) handler that will receive failed flush notification. Applications can use this to ensure that the contents of the buffer are not lost when a flushing error occurs.

getBufferSize

int getBufferSize()
Get the current size of the buffer.

unmodifiable List of TripleUpdates currently in queue.
